trans-unit.source: Like the Back of Your Hand #Ability #TaskAbility #High #Core
trans-unit.target: Like the Back of Your Hand #Ability #TaskAbility #High #Core

trans-unit.source: All tasks directly related to a starcraft that you own or have a direct connection with are eased. Tasks include repair, refueling, finding a breach in the hull, finding a stowaway, and so on. The same goes for any attack or defense rolls you make within the starcraft against enemy boarders, as well as any attack or defense rolls you make with the ship against enemy ships.
trans-unit.target: All tasks directly related to a starcraft that you own or have a direct connection with are eased.
